entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Truro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 2:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
